artist: Delineator: Jean Baptiste Descamps; Engraver: A Pinssio
description: bust length portrait of a man facing right looking out at viewer; oval cartouche in a rectangle with drapery at top; two men and a building with flag at right and a young man with patch near eye at left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [JOSEPH/ VAN/ CRAESBEKE,/ ÉLEVE DE BRAUWER/  JB Descomps inv.   A. Pinssio Sculp]; on sheet in pencil: [1-319]
title: Portrait of Joseph van Craesbeke
